Class ec.ez.ezvm.EnterPovExpr 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.ez.runtime.ParseNode
           |
           +----ec.ez.ezvm.Expr

                   +----ec.ez.ezvm.EnterPovExpr
public class EnterPovExpr
extends Expr
BNF: "enterPov" expr block

Evaluate 'expr' in the current pov. It must evaluate to a Scope, in which case, evaluate block in that pov.

See Also:
PovExpr, Scope

EnterPovExpr(Expr, Expr)

block()
eval(Scope)
Used to evaluate this expression to a value.
